website_summaries.verdict: This extra set of eyes boasts easy installation and a smooth wireless signal.
pros: This backup camera works on cars, trucks, RVs, vans, trailers, and everything in between
Clear night vision is a standout feature here, as are the parking lines
12V power cord equips USB outlet so you can still use the port
cons: Some users have reported flickering monitors and scratchy pictures

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a high quality product at all. The screen would go in and out if the cord was touched. I have had it a little over a month and now it has completely gone black and doesn’t turn on. A complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklynn York

customer_reviews.title: Works very well and very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backup camera. It was very easy to install in my 2010 Toyota Corolla and works very well. The packaging and instructions are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer RDD

customer_reviews.title: Well maybe it works maybe it doesnt
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a tester to check the correct wire yet but I have everything hooked up had a 50/50 shot it would be the right one no good. So I stopped cutting more wire and will get a tester to double check and wire it back up. Directions are rather vague and had to watch three videos to get the idea maybe when it works it will get a better review. It only took 30 minutes to hook everything up and then trial and error still doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Matt Annuschat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera and picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well-I have had others with terrible picture quality but this was clear and sharp. The night vision really impressed me. I thought it was good just because of my backup lighting but I set the parking brake and sure enough, it was still very well lit. I just wish I didn't have to install it on the backup lights- I tried using the tail lights that illuminate when you turn on your headlights, but the voltage drop was too great. Not sure how this can be overcome.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D King

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good!!
customer_reviews.text: One problem I had was the connections that was sent with it. I used them first but they don't work very good, couldn't keep a good contact with them so I wired it in and soldered the wires, works great now. The picture isn't great but works good enough for me. Backing into a dark garage was great. I did notice that it fogged up during a rain. Just have to wipe it off when you get ready to backup.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Long

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Well-built equipment was easy to install. Just make sure the transmitter is exactly where you want it to be. Once the adhesive grabs, there's no moving it. The only problem is that STOP keeps flashing at the bottom of the screen. But, the view is wide and the picture quality is great. I mounted it on my 2500HD crew cab pickup and now I can see what's in the 10 feet behind me that I couldn't see before.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: NOT wireless, has to be wired and says the ...
customer_reviews.text: NOT wireless, has to be wired and says the received has to be hooked to the camera, but put received in truck. I'm NOT drilling a hole in my NEW truck for this
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: good service
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with the screen and AutoVox worked great with me. They stood behind their product and send me a new one. I highly recommend the company and their products. My backup camera works great and I’m very happy with them and the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Installation is pretty simple, only took half and hour to setup
customer_reviews.text: My 2009 Toyota Camry didnot have a backup camera therefore i bought this wireless backup camera. It makes reversing or parking a lot easier. Installation is pretty simple, only took half and hour to setup. It has 4.3” LCD monitor, built in wireless receiver which reduces the effort to run cable to the front of the vehicle. The camera quality is top notch especially at this price point and the visuals are clear. The guidelines can be turned on/off which can be controlled by the button.
customer_reviews.author: Hisila Karki

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless backup Camera
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy it was to tie into my current wiring, the wires for the anteanna could have been longer so I could have positioned the antenna better on the ceiling of my topper but everything works great. It would be nice to have a power option where you could wire into the ignition power instead of cigarette lighter for a cleaner install.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K Sword

customer_reviews.title: look for something else
customer_reviews.text: Reception is poor and loses connection often. When it does connect the picture is grainy and has lines running through it. I am past the return window. to be honest it was such a pain to hide the voltage converter that I am not looking forward to replacing it. But that looks like what I'll have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Hazmat456

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install on my 2000 work truck will help me back onto trailers
customer_reviews.text: This camera was easy to install only took a few minutes. Works great. Nice bright LEDs to see at night. If using provided wire splicers make sure they are pushed completely down and locked or it might not get power to it. I know from experience.
customer_reviews.author: McKele Frost

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Works great though because of where I located the camera I had to use an external antenna to improve the video. My issue not because of the camera. I like being able to power screen through power port ( cigarett lighter) on my truck. I leave it full time when towing my trailer so I can see what is directly behind me.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kukuk

customer_reviews.title: Great back up camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far this little back up camera has perform as I expected it to. The picture quality is good for being wireless and easy to install. The only thing I have noticed is that sometimes it seems like it loses signal a little bit but it doesn't last long, more kind is like a glitch. I have it mounted on my can-am x3 xmr to assist with backing up and to see the riders behind me. So the antenna isn't very far away, maybe 3ft. Overall I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my own christmas gift after my mother bought one for herself. i had car toys install it. i just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Martha A. Doggett

customer_reviews.title: Grid lines way off
customer_reviews.text: The red stop grid line on the monitor shows the car is almost touching the car you're backing up to; but when you get out and look there's still two feet between your car and the front of the other car. Grid lines are not adjustable. So no help when you're parallel parking. Get a backup camera that you let's you adjust the grid line
customer_reviews.author: PGS

customer_reviews.title: My best helper when parking
customer_reviews.text: A must-have for mini-vans. I bought several things for my van recently. This one is the best. I need it to park my car along the street. This one is the best helper when I am parking.
customer_reviews.author: John Leeu

customer_reviews.title: Might be okay for close proximity but not on back of trailer
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a 32 ft camper, transmitter to monitor over 40 foot. The display had a tendency to cut out and get snowy. Recieved a replacement and same problem. Tried to move the transmitter closer to the monitor but still had the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Backup Camera
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is excellent. Would recommend to anyone looking for an after market camera.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: for less $60 great buy
customer_reviews.text: love it! easy to install. the hardest part, is how to put the wires from the middle of the Lic plate to the inside of the trunk wiring is easy, takes like 15-30 mins complete setup The power (+ and -) of the Camera is use the backup light ( + and -) of the car and connect the cam
customer_reviews.author: Thuy

customer_reviews.title: Good price, easy install,  but scratchy picture
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy the system was to install and the quality of the picture but when I started backing up to hook up to my travel trailer, the picture started to break up and become stacticy. Would give 5 stars if not for the stactic
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D.

customer_reviews.title: Wireless backup camera
customer_reviews.text: I recommend buying a direct wired system. The remote antenna stopped working after a few months of use!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good camera!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install, and worked immediately. HOWEVER.. The camera lasted for about 3 minutes and went black. Auto-Vox was VERY responsive to send a replacement camera. Mounted on my pontoon boat bunker trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I liked it. Super easy to install. Wide display made easy especially in reverse and parallel process. Highly recommended to those who want add new features to your old ones.
customer_reviews.author: DP2018

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 6 months or so...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well through a New Hampshire summer (suction sometimes fell when the sun was hitting the truck hard). Started messing up during the cold New Hampshire winter and now seems to be completely dead.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Loch

customer_reviews.title: Only provide 12 volts DC and you can put it anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera easy to install and it will work with 12 volts not necessarily the rear backup circuit. I'm planning to mount it for gooseneck hook up and for RV backup
customer_reviews.author: daniel cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Picture Cuts Out and/or Gets Fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for use on our camper as we pull a fifth wheel with our boat behind. It works fairly well. The only complaint we have is that when we are on the road the picture gets fuzzy and cuts out at times. My husband thinks it is because we have the receiver on the wrong side of the camper so we will have to try that. It seems a little temperamental based on the location so be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa G.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Installation was simple. Looked good stationary. Once I started driving it was staticky and turning off and on the whole time. I was trying to save a few $$. It was not more the 10 to the 15 feed away!
customer_reviews.author: Travis M.

customer_reviews.title: Camera works great
customer_reviews.text: The camera works great the only problem was the mount would not stay affixed to the windshield. Elena sent us a new mount and it has remained in place so all is good. Elena responded quickly and politely.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Thank you! Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised - great picture at night and day! Very easy to install (but, if you have a newer car...can be a challenge accessing the reverse light - nothing to do with the product though! Also shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put on a car we got overseas. Works well for the small spaces we have to get in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Rosenburg

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product is great for the price. Took a bit longer to install, due to the make and model of my vehicle. Overall it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best value camera
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is great. Picture is very good and it took 30 minutes to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing backup cam with great pic quality and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and must have. Amazing picture quality and ease of installation is a plus plus. its a great product
customer_reviews.author: Aarti Jajoo

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: A good little inexpensive backup camera that was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Kris M.

customer_reviews.title: installation cost more than the product and not recommended by installer
customer_reviews.text: Returned product; installation cost more than the product and not recommended by installer.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this and straight out of the box the monitor didn't work. I'm glad I didn't do the whole install first and then find out it didn't work. Monitor just flashed for a second and then no image. Tried to get customer support through Amazon and got nothing. Just processed the return today.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Probably ok for a a car or pickup, but that’s about it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to install on my 16’ enclosed trailer. First, I had to drill a 3/4” hole in my trailer to run the camera power through. Ugh! Then, the aluminum body of the trailer blocks all the signal from the camera unit to the display. The only way it works is if the transmitter is outside the trailer. I’ll be sending it back, but now I have a big hole in the back of my trailer. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amie P.

customer_reviews.title: It worked very well the only two area I would like to see is
customer_reviews.text: I mounted the backup camera on my Wrangler Unlimited Dragon series. Unlike other series, it has a covered rear spare tire so I have to mount else where. It worked very well the only two area I would like to see is: 1. A 5" monitor 2. An extension cable of maybe 24" as it will give me more choice of mounting the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and set up. Works great and I really love it. My suction mount was a little warped and would not stick properly, but the support link worked great and Amazon were able to help me get a replacement! Wish I'd gotten one of these before I backed into my wife's car :-(.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Easy wireless install.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy. The wireless range is very good price was even better for what you get. I used it on my fifth wheel and connected it to a power source that would stay on. This way it's used as a rear view mirror application. It's perfect. And much-needed. Would definitely recommend this product to my camping Buddies
customer_reviews.author: Shane johanson

customer_reviews.title: this camera was easy to install in the license plate frame of my trunk
customer_reviews.text: I installed this camera on a Volvo S80 2007 sedan. The installation went smoothly. I was able to find a custom Mounting clip that allowed me to put the camera on the dashboard without Drilling any holes. ( see the Pro Clip web site). the picture quality is excellent. The camera switches on automatically when reverse is engaged and turns off when shifted into drive. The transmitter unit mounts in the trunk after connection to the power supply to the back up light light.the power lead to the cigarette cable is easily concealed in the molding of the dashboard.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Monahan

customer_reviews.title: shockingly worked out great !
customer_reviews.text: I did have to have a company put this in for $100 but worth it !!! great picture and looks good works on my 2006 car perfectly . All together cost less than the units the guy was trying to sell me with out the install , so I"m very happy with the price :)
customer_reviews.author: Country/city lady

customer_reviews.title: The installation of this system was really pretty easy on my 2006 BW 325xi Sportswagon
customer_reviews.text: The installation of this system was really pretty easy on my 2006 BW 325xi Sportswagon. You tube videos helped tremendously especially since the sensors on German cars could give mixed readings. I ordered the capacitor to go with the camera kit, wired it up, and the camera worked perfectly. The camera works very well in daylight and at night. When the weather is bad, you need to clean it off. Thanks to Raymond Urias' youtube installation videos.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Kern

customer_reviews.title: Product functions as described  on web site
customer_reviews.text: NOTE: The monitor does not power up unless the camera and transmitter are connected and working. A statement to this fact in the installation manual would have saved me considerable time as I expected the monitor to blank screen when powered up. Once all components are installed the system works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Tufferman

customer_reviews.title: CarPlay will do a lot more and has a backup camera, giving to charity
customer_reviews.text: ugh, I am not that talented at puzzles and this after watching several videos I backed out of, it was too hard for me to install, I tried to affix the monitor and it fell off right away
customer_reviews.author: C. Reeve

customer_reviews.title: easy application
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to install and good picture quality. Have to get used to the curved effect of the picture because of the monitor not being as large as the factory installed cameras. Otherwise well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LWN

customer_reviews.title: My grandson installed this camera in no time. The ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson installed this camera in no time. The picture is so clear. I look forward to driving tomorrow and the days to come.
customer_reviews.author: Gerri Rorer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a Christmas gift, took a look at the instructions and then at my vehicle, looks to be a little more complicated than it says. Still excited to see how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s deserve 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This wireless backup is really great and work perfect. I have one backup camera on my car and this one I get for my brother car. He is very happy with this item thank you very much for fantastic wireless backup camera.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: bought for Chevy Safari extended work van. Works excellent. No more wondering where the hitch on the trailer is at. Set up took 30mins max.
customer_reviews.author: stoneygreek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a great price. Clear picture every time!
customer_reviews.author: ruth dailey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It could stay suctioned better but love the product. Very cost effective
customer_reviews.author: Buster P.

customer_reviews.title: Always buy wireless ... like this one ... and use the included connectors correctly
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily. Be sure to check your power wire with a tester first
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and monitor is clear and well made
customer_reviews.author: kauai girl

customer_reviews.title: Clear video quality and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works with my truck and makes backing up so much easier now.
customer_reviews.author: Pj singh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome back up camera especially for the price, was easy to install and works great
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift and they love everything about it
customer_reviews.author: Renee and Will

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: So waited to review this and after several weeks no huge complaints. Super easy to install and picture is super clear. With wireless signals sometimes I get static (which was to be expected) but I can live with a little static once in a while. I put the wireless receiver behind my left brake light because I didn’t want it in the bed of my truck. I would buy this again and have highly recommended it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: HOWDY FOLKS

customer_reviews.title: not good for trucks IMO
customer_reviews.text: After getting the camera the directions clearly intend for the sending unit for the camera to be in an indoor environment. Well the cord is not long enough to make that happen with a truck. So my sending unit is under the bed of the truck. It causes a little disruption with the receiver. It would have been nice if the advertising made this situation clear or that the cord from the camera lens to the sending unit was at least twice as long
customer_reviews.author: douglas kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am fully revising my review after working with the seller to resolve the minor issue I had at first. Once I contacted the seller they worked diligently to get me a replacement monitor and followed up non-stop to ensure I was satisfied. The camera is now fully installed and works great, I’m able to clearly see if there is anything behind me as well as knowing where to stop when backing which was my initial desire anyway. Installation was a breeze, the product was professionally packaged, and I am very happy with the end result. I will buy from Auto-vox again.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry H

customer_reviews.title: Clear image.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Image quality is quite good. Only negative is that it takes a few seconds to come on when you shift in to reverse. Not sure this is normal or not.
customer_reviews.author: Big E

customer_reviews.title: Wireless. Its not.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it said wireless, that bring the case I could install. It cost more than I wanted to pay but it said "WIRELESS", it's not. Why is it listed this eay?
customer_reviews.author: sandy harrod

product_meta.title: AUTO-VOX W1 Wireless Backup Camera Monitor Kit,IP 68 Waterproof Rear View License Plate Back up Camera with LED, Super Night Vision for Cars,Truck,Van,Caravan,Trailers,Camper
feature_bullets: Fast Installation on Wireless System: Unlike the wired cameras, W1 keeps the rear camera and wireless transmitter separated to save you from the hassle of running wires through the car.

Safety Parking with Superior Night Vision:Six HD LED light start to work automatically in darkness,which ensures to show you a clear image even in night. And it comes with guidelines that helps in measuring accurate distance for parking to avoid collision and scratch backward.

Stable Signal Transmission: W1 has a strong signal to avoid the interference from other wireless devices like Bluetooth devices, home security systems. It can transmit stable and high definition pictures to the monitor. Noted：Place it closer to the monitor and at the same height.
Flexible and Sticky Monitor Mount : The 4.3-inch monitor comes with a washable sticky silicon suction mount ,which allows you to place the display on your windshield or dashboard freely.
Guaranteed After-sales Service : 12 months Warranty. Professional customer service and technical support team will give you the timely reply about any question within 24 HOURS (service@auto-vox.com).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars179 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
